record.description: Belles of 1941 wear gowns of 1893 at the University of Chicago's 50th anniversary celebration. These co-eds will be candidates for "Belle of the Ball" at the Midway of 1893 Carnival that will be held Friday and Saturday in the university Field house. Left to right are Misses Mildred Eichler, Carol Peel, Phoebe Hopkins, Shirley Greenwalt, Nancy Smith, Dorothy Anderson, Roberta Sheppard, and Margaret Robben.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Paint and marker on surface for cropping instructions.
